article_title: Futurists Talk Technology’s Impact on Health Care
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: Advancements in artificial intelligence and other technologies will democratize the healthcare industry, making it more affordable and accessible.
twitter.title: Futurists Talk Technology’s Impact on Health Care
